thread.title: Mobile man struck and killed by tractor trailer collision
thread.title_full: Mobile man struck and killed by tractor trailer collision

author: mynbc15.com
title: Mobile man struck and killed by tractor trailer collision
text: {p}According to ALEA, a multi-vehicle crash that occurred at approximately 6:06 p.m. Sunday, April 6, has claimed the life of a Mobile man. Hayley B. Terry, 20, was fatally injured when the 2004 Ford F150 he was driving was struck by a 2005 Kenworth tractor-trailer driven by David S. Clark, 70, of Avon Park, Fla. The F150 then struck the 2018 Kenworth tractor-trailer driven by Franklin M. Fajardo, 32, of Houston, Texas. Terry was pounced deceased at the scene.{/p}{p}The crash occurred on Interstate 10 near the 14 mile marker, approximately one mile west of Mobile, in Mobile County. Nothing further is available as Troopers with the Alabama Law Enforcement Agencyâ€™s (ALEA) Highway Patrol Division continue to investigate.{/p}","readAloud":null,"isReadAloudChecked":true,"derivedImages":{"externalId":"afe99ad6-cf2e-42a6-8b7c-f3ea05fa573e","heroImageFromPackageMedia":{"type":"Image","uuid":"c9dcd6ae-952b-46e8-87fd-0bec58c93a20","title":"Mobile
